attributes.name: support
attributes.metakeywords: support, sharpcms, cms, open source, website, asp.net, c#

element.text: Support and how to get involved

Go to the documentation to lern more about using sharpcms:
http://docs.sharpcms.org/.
The documentation isn't currently finished. Please feel free to register and to work on the sharpcms documentation.

If you have questions about sharpcms, please use the discussions on Codeplex:
http://www.codeplex.com/sharpcms/Thread/List.aspx

The former discussions on Google Group is allready open as an archive:
http://groups.google.com/group/SharpCms

The first video tutorial is up:
http://www.sharpcms.org/video/demo.html
